thread.title: 'Racist bigot' with a swastika tattoo on his chest jailed
thread.title_full: 'Racist bigot' with a swastika tattoo on his chest jailed

title: 'Racist bigot' with a swastika tattoo on his chest jailed
text: Racist bigot' who called Hitler 'God' and had a swastika tattoo on his chest is jailed for five years for having a 'bomb recipe' on his laptop and posting hundreds of extremist messages online 'Racist, homophobe and religious bigot' Sean Creighton, 45, jailed for 5 years He had explosives 'recipes' on laptop and guide on 'how to kill with a knife' Father-of-three lived with parents and put up racist stickers and posters locally Called Facebook 'Jewbook' and after being banned 300 times used Russia's VK One message said he wouldn't 'shed tears' for 'a n****r, Jew, commie or queer'
